website_summaries.verdict: If you want to do a full comprehensive prep, short of paying $1,000 for an actual prep course, and have the self-discipline to get through each and every book, this is your choice. Note: this series is best if you have a minimum of 6+ weeks available.
pros: Manhattan Prep digs deep into every topic of the test and provides simple, effective techniques and strategies to help you master each section
cons: The depth and breadth of the questions can be overkill, and there are some typos in the math problems
Manhattan Prep tends to lean toward slightly more difficult questions compared to the actual exam

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time buying from this seller. You will only recieve 1 book and not 8 as described in the descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I was very pleased with this product. I studied religiously for three months in preparation, and I obtained a 162 quant, 163 verbal and 5.0 in writing. This series is a great foundation for the GRE. It is not the end all be all but a great tool! I would still recommend youtube videos and other websites but it was my bible.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: There is no reason to go to one of those classes besides the essay portion. I used this primary for the math and it's VERY easy to walk through. I did well and it was due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: These books helped me so much. Got a high ...
customer_reviews.text: These books helped me so much. Got a high enough score my first time taking the test. You must be self guided and focused to use these books.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew and Holly

customer_reviews.title: Got me into the program I wanted to be in!
customer_reviews.text: Was a great set of books. It got me prepped and gave me plenty of insight. The practice tests were 100% accurate to the real thing. In other words these books got me into my graduate program!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Online book registration access code
customer_reviews.text: The books came with a sheet which had instructions for how to register the books online to access the online test bank. The access code was supposed to be found on the inside of the back cover. None of the books in this series had any access code. The inside of the back cover is completely blank. Not sure if I received a faulty set. Thinking of returning or exchanging them for a new set. Anyone else with a similar experience? Please advice.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyPawsome

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good set
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good set, a lot of material here. This set is heavy on the Quantitative section of the GRE with two books of the eight covering verbal / writing sections. All books have nice detail not only on the subject matter but on the things and types of questions you can expect to see on the test as well as strategies on how to handle them. Would have given five starts but there are errors in some of the math practice problems and examples. Found one or two that are flat out interpreted wrong justifying and leading you to an incorrect answer. No excuse for that in this context in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: There is only one book in the advertised set of 8
customer_reviews.text: This is marketed as a set of 8, but I only received one of the books in the set for a whopping $140+. This is outrageous, and instead of trying to purchase this again online, I will try to purchase the set in person. I sincerely hope I’m able to get a full refund, and that this is looked into. These study guides are expensive, and I would be even more upset if I were still an undergrad making very little money. Seriously, save yourself the trouble and just go to to your local bookstore if you’re able to.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Guilfoyle

customer_reviews.title: Workbooks Woroth Your While!
customer_reviews.text: I've been working through each book since March. I took a Math practice test (untimed) in April and scored in the 60th percentile. I took another one this month and I scored in the 74th percentile! My skills are steadily improving and I owe full credit to Manhattan Prep's workbooks. They explain almost all of the material and problems in such a way that it's easy to understand and not over my head.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed using these. Excellent resource materials for reviewing math concepts. Most of the problem set style were in the actual GRE test. The words too were very useful. You don't need the flash cards if you purchase these, just make your own.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: this is a great series to use
customer_reviews.text: If you're struggling with any GRE concepts, this is a great series to use. The books, individually, are not too big, so they're not as intimidating as the 5lb book (which is a great addition to this set). Manhattan Prep materials were super helpful for me, someone who suffers from test anxiety and will avoid something like the GRE at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for short term intense prep for GRE
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful set that helped raise my scores. Clearly outlined sections allow to focus on areas you really need to work on. If you have a month or two to prepare this is a great tool to use. Also has great information about strategy in approaching some types of questions, to ensure you use time efficiently and understand exactly what the test makers are asking for.
customer_reviews.author: JLW

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I had all of them
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful set of books. I used just the ones that I felt would help me in the areas I needed. I am glad I had all of them, because I used them for practice as well.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Books cover all of the topics on the GRE. They have explanations and practice problems, plus 6 full GRE exams to practice with. The exams are scored for you, except for the writing part. Get a person to read and score those for you. There is a grading scale of how the essays are scored online and a less concise one in guide 7 of the set of books.
customer_reviews.author: Charisse Fesko

customer_reviews.title: excellent resources
customer_reviews.text: amazing books, helped me really study well for the GRE. will recommend this book to everyone of my friends or to anyone who is trying to study for the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Prew

customer_reviews.title: Great Comprehensive study guide for GRE
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow and straight forward, I ended up buying the Economist Online GRE study program, not liking it and coming back to these books. The Economist GRE study tool was a waste of time. These books give you the content you need to know in as simple and few words as possible. This in addition to practice tests (manhattan prep is good for that too) is all you need, I wish I saved my time and money and just stuck with that.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette E.

customer_reviews.title: These books cover everything in the toefl
customer_reviews.text: If you want to cover a lot of quantitative topics and a lot quantitative exercises then you need to buy the whole set of 8 books. I will definitely recommend these books to anyone who want score more than 300. You have to go through each book and do all the problems. You will need a time depending on your base.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullahi Abdi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't done this kind of test for over 20 years. This set of books was PERFECT for getting me up to speed. I scored a slightly above average with about a month or study. Give yourself about 2 to 3 days per book to get through each one.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good prep material, I wouldn't use anything else! I will update this review after I take the exam!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Saved my GRE score!
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t have improved or succeeded in gaining an acceptable GRE score for my graduate schools without Manhattan Prep and their booklets. I used every single one of these, they helped me improve my score significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This is so in depth and has been very useful. I haven't been in college for years
customer_reviews.text: This is so in depth and has been very useful. I haven't been in college for years, so although the foundation is there, I needed help refreshing my standardize test-taking skills (especially with math). There's so many question sets and explanations. Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: CrossfitGRL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to understand explanations and you get 6 online tests
customer_reviews.text: The books are glossy with clean white paes and a pleasure to read. Easy to understand explanations and you get 6 online tests..full length with any of the books. Its cheaper to buy the set if you need more than 4 of these books.If you are going back to graduate school after a long break from college and need a thorough easy to follow refresher on all math concepts and verbal question types... this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Seagal

customer_reviews.title: Bought products already used
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product but all of the answers and drill sets were already filled out. This made it extremely difficult for me to go through them myself with all of the answers out in front of me. Not fair for someone to rent it and completely mark it up in pencil then return it. Then, I buy it expecting a brand new book and it's not. Products should be checked before shipping them back out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found this set of books very useful, especially the math
customer_reviews.text: I found this set of books very useful, especially the math. I used these and the vocabulary flash cards to prepare, took the GRE once, and ended up with a very good score.
customer_reviews.author: ABrooks

customer_reviews.title: Thorough and User-Friendly
customer_reviews.text: These prep books are by far the most thorough that I've tried (both personally and by looking at friends' review books). They're easy to follow and contain a ton of practice problems. I've had no issues thus far, and I've worked through the first 4 of 8 books. I haven't taken the GRE yet, but I already feel better prepared!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Sutton

customer_reviews.title: A comprehensive review
customer_reviews.text: Though I have not taken the exam yet, I am very pleased with this set of guides. I have used prep materials from other companies, and although they are good, Manhattan prep provides a comprehensive and well explained guide on everything that I have not seen matched.
customer_reviews.author: T. Chilton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great set of guides for every topic on the GRE. Helped me quite a lot in my studies.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T.

customer_reviews.title: I only received one book
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this at all. I contacted the seller and no luck. It's not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Best, Bar None!
customer_reviews.text: Bar none, this is the best GRE material on market and I’ve used them all. If you’re looking for every detailed very programmatically, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S. Dungan

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Used these set of books in combination with the Barrons GRE flash cards and the barrons 6 practice tests. These along with 2 months of very determined study helped me achieve a 94% score. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rubino

customer_reviews.title: Used these with less than 2 weeks of studying, ...
customer_reviews.text: Used these with less than 2 weeks of studying, scored well. Don't have much to compare these two though, because I only used Manhattan to prep.
customer_reviews.author: Freakazoid

customer_reviews.title: great set of books
customer_reviews.text: This was a great GRE book set paired with a couple books of practice problems you'll do great.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel D.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Good for detailed and step by step instructions. More than enough practice tests and questions
customer_reviews.author: Sharn Dhaliwal

customer_reviews.title: Full of practice questions
customer_reviews.text: These books are packed with practice questions, problem sets, and drills. The math books are better for practicing skills/increasing speed than for learning concepts.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good company.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great company. These books have been incredibly helpful in my GRE prep.
customer_reviews.author: Apoorv Tandon

customer_reviews.title: Best rated for the value
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this package in the mail! I did a lot of research and found that this is the best rated. I love the format as it is easy to digest in small chunks.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: Good math review
customer_reviews.text: Will find out how great these are once I pass the exam lol. Good math review
customer_reviews.author: laura e knight

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great books if you've been away from math for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: These books are the best. The questions are much like the ones on ...
customer_reviews.text: These books are the best. The questions are much like the ones on the actual exam and the material is written in a way that is clear and thorough.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle N. Mebert

customer_reviews.title: These books are perfect for those students that were far from study for a while.
customer_reviews.text: It was an excellent series of books. It was my first time that I was studying GRE and reviewing math after 12 years! so, obviously first couldn't remember anything, but these books refreshed my mind!!. My suggestion is these books are perfect for those students that were far from study for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Take you step by step I think it is appropriate for international students
customer_reviews.text: Take you step by step I think it is appropriate for international students
customer_reviews.author: Rakan almazmomi

customer_reviews.title: Multiple choice answers for non-multiple choice questions?
customer_reviews.text: I like that the lessons are straight forward and clear. What knocks it back 2 stars is that the answer key for some of the math portions will show A, B, C, D as an answer choice, but the question itself is not written as a multiple choice. I will solve for what I think the question is asking, and find that the math is right, but the answer will sometimes refer to something that was not asked in the original question. A bit confusing at times.
customer_reviews.author: Pelleas80

customer_reviews.title: Great for GRE prep
customer_reviews.text: I got it how it was described for that I thank the seller shipping was quick thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Best ones I've used
customer_reviews.text: These books will make you feel very prepared. Best ones I've used.
customer_reviews.author: John Rissell

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I definately suggest that if you use this system, buy it at least two months in advance before your test, there is a lot of material in these books. It contains online codes to use on the website and 6 free practice test (which were formatted just like the GRE). I suggest you get use to using the calculator on the practice test, because they won't let you bring in an outside calculator during the actual GRE test. I'm super happy with this purchase and my GRE score, I highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great in-depth resource. Tons of practice and detailed, clear explanations of concepts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great study books!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend if you're studying for the GRE by yourself. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for self-learning
customer_reviews.text: Good tool for self-learning! Some of the problem sets and solution pages don't correspond properly though so at times it's a little frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: desigrlbkny

customer_reviews.title: Great review series!
customer_reviews.text: Great review series!! I have been out of school for a while and needed to take the GRE. I am very pleased with my score. These books start with the basics but cover all the information you need to prepare. The vocab definitely was useful on the test. The online practice tests were almost identical to the real GRE and the practice scores were fairly consistent...I actually got higher on the real test than on these practice tests. Highly recommend! The ETS has their own quantitative review available for free on their website, but it isn't as thorough or easy to go through.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: These are expensive but are a great tool for exhaustive review
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive but are a great tool for exhaustive review. I would suggest purchasing the 5 LBS MP book as a complement. You get as much as you put into these books and there is plenty of potential.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bedsole

customer_reviews.title: Great books, great price
customer_reviews.text: These strategy guides are incredible. It's a set of 8 separate books that are about 200 pages each. They have really great practice problems and explain things in a clear, accessible manner. I wholeheartedly recommend these books for your GRE preparation journey and the value on amazon is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: VeganSista

customer_reviews.title: Great condition! I am yet to take a practice ...
customer_reviews.text: Great condition! I am yet to take a practice exam so I can not speak on well it prepares you for the exams, I can say that the topics in discussed are properly explained.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Marlon Onofre

customer_reviews.title: Good study aids
customer_reviews.text: I've done many things to help myself prepare for the GRE but these series of books have been my favorite. They are comprehensive and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Cooper

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good....
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The math ones I have looked at explain problems very clearly for those like me who have not taken math in years!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: There is no need for any class with these books.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Bauer

customer_reviews.title: its proven to be very useful: )
customer_reviews.text: No second thoughts! Go for it, its proven to be very useful :)
customer_reviews.author: Rakesh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very clear explanation, step by step and various difficulty level questions being provided..
customer_reviews.author: Yuna Valianta Aulia

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE RENTAL!!!! Rented this book to prepare for my GRE. Paid 75 dollars to rent It and someone completed all of the sets of problems directly in the book!!! Making It impossible to do any of them. Extremely disappointed will be calling for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Sue B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best GRE prep course book I have used. Detailed and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: ... have if you are seriuosly trying to get a better score and are self studying
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you are seriuosly trying to get a better score and are self studying.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every thing looks so great like a new, and there are other additional stuff. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: DongIl Seo

customer_reviews.title: I got into my dream school but low score
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these along with the 5lb, basic and advanced flash cards. Three months prior to my test I quit my job and my relationship ended because all I did was study day and night. This product is a good choice if you want to get familiar with the material but I should mention I didn't get a high score. Even if you get a low score, apply. I got 155, 149, 4 QVE respectivly... However, I did get accepted at my top choice for engineering school and I have to say it's somewhat thanks to manhatan book.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: All books are broken down into sections for better reading, with test taking tips and strategies
customer_reviews.text: I am really looking forward to reading these. All books are broken down into sections for better reading, with test taking tips and strategies. Of course, there are practice exams online once you complete the learning. There is no particular order to learn. Best product referred for GRE prep. Best wishes!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Worth It. I Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Studying for the GRE? Of course you are, you're reading this review. I wish you the best of luck! These books are amazing. I hadn't touched Geometry in years and each book provides you with an easy, hand-holding walkthrough of each subject and you don't feel like a complete dolt. It teaches you tricks and strategies for each situation. I scored well over 300 using mainly these books. I highly recommend them. BTW, I'm keeping mine for whenever I need a refresher for Grad school or otherwise. Heck, if I have kids, I'm letting them use these.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of books.
customer_reviews.text: A great review of math if you have been out of school for a while. In addition, these great books also helped bring my verbal up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Benton

customer_reviews.title: MISSING BOOK GUIDE!!
customer_reviews.text: I received only SEVEN books out of the eight total. I have not had a chance to look at the books yet but I have a feeling that they will help me study. However, I am disappointed about the missing book. I will update once the seller gets back to me on this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Palmer

customer_reviews.title: don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: You won’t receive the full set. You get 1 out of the 8 guides
customer_reviews.author: Calculus

customer_reviews.title: awesome books. i gave them to my brother afterwards
customer_reviews.text: awesome books. i gave them to my brother afterwards. the flash cards are a must!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i would recommend getting the official GRE study before buying any other exam preps.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Books!!! Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These books are awesome. Haven't taken the GRE yet, but will make sure I write the review after I get my score. I finished 2/8 books in 1 week. It explains everything, including tricks and tips to solve math problems faster. I can almost gurantee a score boost without even taking it yet because I can solve all the math problema very quickly given you have 30 minutes in the section and using the calculator can slow you down.
customer_reviews.author: Yagnesh

customer_reviews.title: He loves it and get a pretty good score
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this for GRE preparation. He loves it and get a pretty good score.
customer_reviews.author: Dong Yan

customer_reviews.title: Great, thorough set of GRE study books
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my choice of these books for GRE study (I chose these after doing some research about different book publishers). They provide in-depth coverage for each math topic area and lots of practice problems, as well as online access to 6 full practice exams. Definitely make sure to do the online practice exams, since they provide you an experience with the "tracking," where the test becomes more difficult if you perform well on the first section. Also, not sure if this experience is shared by others but I performed 3 points better on math and 4 points better on verbal in my actual GRE exam than in the online Manhattan Prep practice exams.
customer_reviews.author: M. Swain

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: excellent review for gre. not suggested for last minute cram session. love the online practice test. Very realistic and similar to the real gre.!
customer_reviews.author: Shelita Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: After 10+ Yrs Away from Math
customer_reviews.text: I used these sources for 6 weeks and superseded the ideal score I needed. I LOVED these books. They do a great job at explaining concepts and preparing you for the rest. I didn't want to just learn how to beat the test--I wanted to learn. Period.
customer_reviews.author: T. Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Best GRE prep
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for those of us who have not had high school courses in a while!! Very helpful refresher!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: ... who had a bit of maths confusion I personally recommend these series it will help you assimilate those comcepts ...
customer_reviews.text: I must say those who had a bit of maths confusion I personally recommend these series it will help you assimilate those comcepts which havent read or forgotten
customer_reviews.author: Khan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The delivery came earlier than expected and it was great prep materials.
customer_reviews.author: sandra jacques

customer_reviews.title: Only received guide 4, not all 8!
customer_reviews.text: Only got book guide number 4... was supposed to be 8 total...
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Steyer

customer_reviews.title: Best reel I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Great reel. Have shimano crudara, a pluger sepremeand a revo. This reel out preforms them all. Only problem was no users manual,
customer_reviews.author: Terry McFall

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with Tender Loving Care
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these books. They are perfect for a very busy lady such as myself who just needs a straight, to-the-point review of all things GRE. Thanka for making sure to wrap my books up securely because when the package was left at my home it was raining cats and dogs any I have no canopy over my porch. The books were perfect !!!!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE HAYWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Very useful books with Clean and white papers
customer_reviews.text: Very useful books with Clean and white papers. I advice every one to order these set of books. These books explain the basic principles of mathematics and contain a lot of examples and questions that qualify the students to solve every GRE question. Regards
customer_reviews.author: ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Purchase went well and item arrived fast, all as ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchase went well and item arrived fast, all as expected! I'm leaving 5 stars but I'm not paid for this nor do I get items for free.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew
